mapper.select: SELECT user_id as username, pwd as password FROM users u WHERE 1=1 AND user_id = #{username}

SELECT m.url AS RES, mr.role_id AS AUTH, CASE WHEN m.use_yn = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS READABLE, CASE WHEN m.use_yn = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS WRITABLE FROM menu m JOIN menu_roles mr ON m.menu_id = mr.menu_id WHERE 1=1 AND m.url IS NOT NULL AND m.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY m.parent_id NULLS FIRST, m.sort_order ASC, m.menu_id ASC
